mapper.select: select * from qna order by re_ref desc, re_seq asc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update qna set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
update qna set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
mapper.delete: delete from qna where num=#{num} or re_ref=#{num}
mapper.update: update qna set re_seq=re_seq+1 where re_ref=#{re_ref} and re_seq>#{re_seq}
update qna set state='답변완료' where num=#{num}
